name: Ametista
description:
A very simple multiplayer arcade game, made for the NoFutureContest. You get to control minecarts, collect crystals and take them out of the field. Everytime a minecart full of crystals leaves the screen, it changes the border's color. Whoever paints the most tiles wins. That's it!

Supports up to four players in a keyboard or in gamepads.
